DOC.brief_summary: Safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics investigate multiple dose escalation study . In three treatment group different dosage BAY 60-4552 vardenafil give patient erectile dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Escalation Study ( 14 Days ) Investigate Safety , Tolerability , PK PD Vardenafil BAY60-4552
DOC.criteria: The informed consent must sign study specific test procedures do Male patient history erectile dysfunction ( ED ) least 6 month , define `` inability achieve maintain erection penis sufficient complete satisfactory sexual intercourse '' NIH consensus report 1993 . The diagnosis 'Erectile dysfunction ' confirm physician Age : 18 70 year ( inclusive ) first screen examination Ethnicity : White Body mass index ( BMI ) : equal 18 32 kg / mÂ² Confirmation patient 's health insurance coverage prior first screen examination / visit Ability understand follow studyrelated instruction Incompletely cure preexisting disease assume absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination effect study drug normal Known hypersensitivity study drug ( active substance excipients preparation ) Known severe allergy , nonallergic drug reaction , multiple drug allergy Any underlying cardiovascular condition , include unstable angina pectoris would preclude sexual activity accord NIH consensus report 1993 History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within 6 month prior screen Bleeding disorder History prostatectomy prostate cancer , include nervesparing technique . Clarification : Any surgical procedure treatment Benign Prostate Hypertrophy ( BPH ) permit , exception cryosurgery , cryotherapy cryoablation Hereditary degenerative retinal disorder retinitis pigmentosa History loss vision NAION ( Bayer Study 12912 ) , temporary permanent loss vision , include unilateral loss vision History uni bilateral hearing loss
